job_history.work_description: Direct team activities, establishing task priorities, scheduling and tracking work assignments, providing guidance, and ensuring the availability of resources. Report project plans, progress, and results. Direct and support the compilation and analysis of technical source data necessary for product development.

Directly supervise 15+ military personnel. Evaluate employees' work performance. Promote team approach. Share information and search for input from internal and external sources. Maintain accurate documentation of all employees. Mentor personnel.
